source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT * FROM APPS.BIA_POWER_KW_CONTRACT_LINE_V
WHERE  RUN_DATE	>= sysdate -92;

SELECT * FROM APPS.BIA_PO_DISTRIBUTIONS_BRDG
WHERE  LAST_UPDATE_DATE >= sysdate -622;

SELECT * FROM APPS.BIA_PO_DISTRIBUTIONS_V
WHERE  LAST_UPDATE_DATE >= sysdate -62;

SELECT * FROM APPS.BIA_XLA_AE_TRANS_V
WHERE  LAST_UPDATE_DATE >= sysdate -62;

SELECT * FROM APPS.BICS_BILLING_FORECAST_MV
WHERE   CONTRACT_START_DATE				>= sysdate -62
	OR	CONTRACT_END_DATE				>= sysdate -62
	OR	LINE_START_DATE					>= sysdate -62
	OR	LINE_END_DATE					>= sysdate -62
	OR	LINE_DATE_TERMINATED			>= sysdate -62
	OR	SUBLINE_START_DATE				>= sysdate -62
	OR	SUBLINE_END_DATE				>= sysdate -62
	OR	DATE_TO_INTERFACE				>= sysdate -62
	OR	BILLING_SCHEDULE_START_DATE		>= sysdate -62
	OR	BILLING_SCHEDULE_END_DATE		>= sysdate -62
	OR	DATE_COMPLETED					>= sysdate -62
	OR	SUBLINE_DATE_TERMINATED			>= sysdate -62;

SELECT * FROM APPS.BICS_GL_JOURNALS_LINE_V
WHERE  LAST_UPDATE_DATE >= sysdate -62
	OR DATE_UPDATED >= sysdate -62
	OR DATE_CREATED >= sysdate -62;

SELECT * FROM APPS.BICS_REQUISITION_PROJECTS_V
WHERE  LAST_UPDATE_DATE			>= sysdate -62;

properties.description: SELECT * FROM mrtgbilling.mrtg_billing WHERE DATE_UPDATED >= sysdate -93;

activities.name: stage_MRTG_BILLING_10_days
activities.description:
Stage Last N days
(Set to 10 for testing - every 60 minutes)

source.query:
SELECT   mrtg_id	
		,customer_id
		,router_id
		,interface_id
		,billing_date
		,billing_usage
		,date_created
		,date_updated
		,created_by
		,updated_by
		,round(billing_usage_in)	billing_usage_in
		,round(billing_usage_out)	billing_usage_out
		,billing_id
		,campus
		,product_line
		,period_name
		,file_name
FROM	mrtgbilling.mrtg_billing
where date_updated between current_timestamp - interval '10 day' and current_timestamp

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT * FROM APPS.BIA_GL_HEADERS_V
WHERE LAST_UPDATE_DATE >= sysdate -62;

SELECT * FROM APPS.BIA_GL_LINES_V
WHERE LAST_UPDATE_DATE >= sysdate -62;
